name: No Happy End
description:
Keyboard controls:

- [WASD] for player movement.

- [Mouse Button Left] to launch a baby. Keep pressed to choose a direction, release to launch!

- [Space] to  drop a baby.

- [Esc] to display the pause menu in a level.

- [Arrow keys] and [Return/Space] to navigate in the UI.

Xbox controller:

-  [Stick left] for player movement.

- [Right Shoulder] to launch a baby. Keep pressed to choose a direction, release to launch!

- [B] to drop a baby.

- [Start] to display the pause menu in a level.

- [Stick left] and [A] to navigate in the UI.

Have fun!
